actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend Title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit States to provide home health care service and other services to individuals who would otherwise be eligible to receive medical assistance if they were institutionalized.

summary.text: Amends Title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to permit States to provide home health care and other services to individuals who would otherwise be eligible to receive medical assistance if they were institutionalized.

titles.title: A bill to amend Title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit States to provide home health care service and other services to individuals who would otherwise be eligible to receive medical assistance if they were institutionalized.
